summary: Finance Ki Sharan (By Alpha Group) is a React + TypeScript single-page financial education platform backed by a Motoko canister on the Internet Computer. The site provides structured learning sections, a searchable glossary with cross-references, categorized articles, research paper downloads (via ExternalBlob), investor-protection/regulations awareness content, a public blogs section (list + detail) backed by backend blog APIs, a contact/feedback flow with an admin-only feedback viewer, and a NIFTY 50 ticker shown in the global footer. Authentication uses DFINITY Internet Identity; backend operations are guarded by role-based access control (admin/user/guest) and an optional maintenance mode that blocks non-admin users. A floating in-app chat widget (“ArthSaathi”) provides deterministic, education-only responses sourced from site content with strict refusal for personalized investment recommendations and legal/tax advice.

existing_features.description: Implements routed pages using TanStack Router with a shared layout (Header, Footer, Toaster, floating ChatAssistantWidget). A MaintenanceWrapper checks backend maintenance status and admin status, showing a full-page MaintenanceScreen to non-admin users when maintenance mode is enabled.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication (frontend)

existing_features.title: Backend actor bootstrap with access-control initialization
existing_features.description: Creates anonymous or authenticated backend actors based on the current Internet Identity and initializes access control for authenticated users using a secret token extracted from the URL hash/session storage.

existing_features.title: Maintenance mode gating with admin bypass
existing_features.description: Backend supports a maintenanceMode flag enforced by checkMaintenanceAccess; frontend queries maintenance/admin status and swaps UI to a maintenance screen when applicable.

existing_features.title: User profile storage (per-caller)
existing_features.description: Backend stores per-caller user profiles; frontend provides React Query hooks to read/save with cache invalidation and toast feedback.

existing_features.title: Glossary term retrieval and search APIs
existing_features.description: Backend exposes getGlossaryTerms and searchGlossary; frontend provides query hooks with normalized search input and aggressive refetch settings for reliability.

existing_features.title: Glossary admin management (CRUD + diagnostics + batch publish)
existing_features.description: Admin-only glossary APIs support add/update/delete, prefix-based diagnostics, and batch publishing of many terms at once.

existing_features.title: Glossary UI with alphabetical grouping and cross-references

existing_features.title: Learning sections listing (accordion UI)
existing_features.description: Fetches learning sections from the backend and displays them in an accordion with paragraph splitting, loading, and empty states.

existing_features.title: Articles by category (tabbed UI)
existing_features.description: Displays categorized articles using tabs; articles are fetched per category from backend queries with loading and empty states.

existing_features.title: Research papers listing and PDF download
existing_features.description: Lists research papers and opens each paper’s ExternalBlob direct URL to download/view the PDF in a new tab.

existing_features.title: Contact page and feedback submission
existing_features.description: Public contact page provides an email link and a feedback form that submits to the backend (with client-side success UI state and toast feedback).

existing_features.title: Admin-only feedback viewer
existing_features.description: Admin page requiring Internet Identity login and admin role to view feedback submissions in a searchable/sortable table with loading and error states.

existing_features.description: Footer displays a horizontally scrollable NIFTY 50 ticker. Client-side IST market-hours detection changes labeling between LTP (market open) and Close (market closed). Data is polled via React Query on a 30-second interval.

existing_features.title: Backend stock data storage and admin update APIs
existing_features.description: Motoko canister stores NIFTY 50 stock objects and symbol lists; includes admin-only stock update functions and public read queries for the frontend ticker.

existing_features.title: Regulations & awareness content page
existing_features.description: Static tabbed page presenting SEBI guidelines, RBI guidelines, and fraud awareness content with an emphasized SEBI risk disclaimer banner.

existing_features.title: Site disclaimer page
existing_features.description: Static disclaimer page communicating educational-only intent, investment risk warnings, accuracy/liability limitations, and external links notice.

existing_features.title: About page
existing_features.description: Static about page describing the platform mission/vision, education-first stance, Alpha Group background, and market ticker concept.

existing_features.title: Public blogs listing page
existing_features.description: BlogsPage lists published blog posts with title, excerpt, date, category, and tags, including loading, empty, and error states.

existing_features.title: Blog detail page
existing_features.description: BlogDetailPage fetches and displays a single blog post by id with metadata (author/date/category/tags) and handles loading, not-found, and error states.

existing_features.title: React Query hooks for blogs
existing_features.description: Provides React Query hooks to fetch the public list of published blogs and an individual blog by id, matching established query patterns in the app.

existing_features.title: Backend blogs feature (public queries + admin CRUD)
existing_features.description: Motoko canister defines a BlogPost type and stores blogs in a Map with incrementing ids. Public queries support listing published blogs and fetching a single blog; admin-only APIs support add/update/delete and category filtering with optional unpublished inclusion for admins.

existing_features.title: Calculators directory page (categorized)
existing_features.description: Lists all available calculators grouped into categories (Investments, retirement, govt schemes, deposits/interest, loans, tax/salary) with navigation to each calculator route and educational disclaimers.

existing_features.title: SIP Calculator
existing_features.description: Computes SIP future value using the standard future value formula based on monthly contribution, annual return rate, and duration; shows invested amount, estimated returns, and maturity value.

existing_features.title: Lump Sum Calculator
existing_features.description: Computes compounded future value for a one-time investment (annual compounding) and displays maturity value and total gain.

existing_features.title: Step-Up Calculator (amount and percentage)
existing_features.description: Projects corpus for SIP where monthly investment increases yearly by fixed amount or percentage (tabbed UI); outputs invested, returns, and maturity value.

existing_features.title: SWP Calculator
existing_features.description: Simulates month-by-month withdrawals from an initial corpus while applying monthly returns; outputs total withdrawn, final balance, and overall growth/loss.

existing_features.title: SSY Calculator (Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana)
existing_features.description: Calculates SSY maturity value using a fixed interest rate (8.2%) and scheme constraints (deposits up to 15 years or until age 21). Outputs total investment, interest earned, and maturity value.

existing_features.title: PPF Calculator
existing_features.description: Projects PPF maturity by iterating yearly deposits and applying annual interest; outputs total invested, interest earned, and maturity value.

existing_features.title: EPF Calculator
existing_features.description: Simulates monthly employee and employer contributions and applies monthly interest over tenure; outputs total employee contribution, total employer contribution, total interest, and maturity balance.

existing_features.title: FD Calculator (simple vs compound)
existing_features.description: Computes FD maturity using either simple interest or compound interest (quarterly compounding). Outputs maturity amount and interest earned.

existing_features.title: RD Calculator
existing_features.description: Estimates RD maturity by summing compounded value of each monthly deposit over the remaining tenure; outputs total deposited, interest earned, and maturity value.

existing_features.title: EMI Calculator
existing_features.description: Computes EMI using the standard amortizing loan formula and outputs monthly EMI, total interest, and total repayment.

existing_features.title: Home Loan EMI Calculator
existing_features.description: Computes home loan EMI and totals (principal, interest, total repayment) and displays principal vs interest percentage of total repayment.

existing_features.title: Fixed vs Reducing Loan Calculator
synonyms: Flat rate vs reducing balance comparison
existing_features.description: Compares total interest and repayment between flat-rate interest on principal and reducing-balance EMI method; shows interest difference.

existing_features.title: GST Calculator
existing_features.description: Calculates GST on a base amount with CGST/SGST split and outputs tax and after-tax amount (rounded to 2 decimals).

existing_features.title: HRA Calculator
existing_features.description: Computes tax-exempt and taxable HRA using the minimum-of-three rule with metro/non-metro selection and an assumed HRA-received percentage in UI logic.

existing_features.title: NPS Calculator
existing_features.description: Projects NPS corpus from monthly contributions until retirement and estimates pension assuming 40% annuitization and a 6% annuity rate; outputs corpus, annuity amount, and monthly pension.

existing_features.title: Atal Pension Yojana (APY) Calculator
existing_features.description: Estimates required monthly contribution using an approximate contribution matrix for age and desired pension; computes total contribution until age 60 plus an estimated corpus.

existing_features.title: Gratuity Calculator
existing_features.description: Calculates gratuity using (Last drawn salary × 15 × Years of service) / 26 with an eligibility check for >= 5 years of service.

existing_features.title: XIRR Calculator
existing_features.description: Allows adding/removing irregular cashflows with dates and estimates annualized returns using a Newton–Raphson approximation to find the rate where NPV≈0.

existing_features.title: CAGR Calculator
existing_features.description: Calculates CAGR from initial value, final value, and period and displays annualized growth percentage.

existing_features.title: Simple Interest Calculator
existing_features.description: Computes simple interest and total amount from principal, annual rate, and time and displays rounded results.

existing_features.title: Simple vs Compound Interest Calculator
existing_features.description: Compares simple vs compound interest side-by-side with selectable compounding frequency; outputs interest earned, maturity values, and difference.

existing_features.title: NSC Calculator
existing_features.description: Computes NSC maturity value using compound growth and outputs interest earned and maturity value.

existing_features.title: Embedded chat assistant widget (ArthSaathi)
existing_features.description: Floating chat UI that supports Hinglish/English preference detection, refuses personalized investment recommendations and legal/tax advice, provides calculator guidance, appends educational disclaimers, and renders clickable sources (glossary/learning/articles; internet results supported in UI if ever returned).

existing_features.title: Chat intent/refusal/formatting utilities
existing_features.description: Utility module implements language detection, recommendation/legal-tax/calculator intent detection, refusal and explanation builders, and disclaimer banner/line management for consistent assistant behavior.

existing_features.title: Backend chatAsk sources API
existing_features.description: Motoko chatAsk query returns a typed list of content sources (glossary terms, learning sections, articles) for the assistant to summarize and cite.

existing_features.title: Blob storage gateway tooling and GC support (canister mixin)
existing_features.description: Canister mixin exposes methods to update authorized gateway principals, list dead blobs for deletion, confirm deletions and trigger GC, refill the cashier canister with cycles, and return a basic upload certificate response.

existing_features.title: Motoko HTTP outcall utility module
existing_features.description: Provides reusable httpGetRequest/httpPostRequest wrappers over the IC management canister http_request, using a transform function to strip headers and a fixed cycle budget.

existing_features.title: Secure URL-hash secret parameter handling (frontend)
existing_features.description: Utilities read sensitive params from the URL hash fragment (not sent to servers), persist them to sessionStorage, and remove them from the URL via replaceState to reduce history leakage.

existing_features.title: Reusable build-template scaffolding for IC React+Motoko app
existing_features.description: Adds a self-contained build template (frontend + backend canister YAMLs, system IDL, Dockerfile, deploy script, workspace/package configs) intended to reproduce or export the project as a standalone Internet Computer React+Motoko application with consistent tooling.

existing_features.title: Frontend tooling hardening via custom ESLint rules
existing_features.description: Introduces custom ESLint rules to enforce presence of the InternetIdentityProvider and to prevent using BigInt values in React Query keys, improving consistency and preventing subtle runtime/caching issues.

existing_features.title: Build-time asset maintenance scripts
existing_features.description: Adds build-template scripts for resizing images and pruning unused images to keep frontend assets optimized and reduce bundle bloat.

existing_features.title: Glossary backup & restore UI panel
existing_features.description: Adds a glossary backup/restore panel in the frontend for exporting and re-importing glossary content, leveraging the app’s storage client tooling for file-based backup flows (intended for admin/maintenance operations).

architectural_notes: Frontend is a SPA built with TanStack Router (file-defined routes) and TanStack React Query for all canister calls (queries + mutations).
UI layer uses TailwindCSS with shadcn-style component primitives; theming is driven by CSS variables (OKLCH tokens) and next-themes for dark/light mode.
Internet Identity auth is encapsulated in an InternetIdentityProvider (AuthClient) with persisted identity restore and login/logout state flags.
Backend canister access is encapsulated via a useActor hook that creates anonymous/authenticated actors and initializes access control using a secret from the URL hash/sessionStorage.
Motoko backend stores application state in in-memory Map structures (profiles, glossary, learning, articles, papers, feedback, stocks, blogs) with incrementing ID counters for some entities.
Role-based access control is enforced server-side; admin bootstrap uses an environment token compared with a caller-provided secret on first initialization.
Maintenance mode is enforced in Motoko via a shared checkMaintenanceAccess guard; frontend has a MaintenanceWrapper that swaps the entire app to a MaintenanceScreen for non-admins.
Chat assistant does client-side intent detection (recommendation/legal-tax/calculator) to refuse early; otherwise it calls a backend chatAsk API and renders typed sources with deep links.
Blob-storage capabilities are integrated via a Motoko mixin that manages authorized gateway principals, dead-blob pruning, GC triggering, and cycle top-up via a cashier canister.
Backend includes reusable HTTP outcall wrappers (GET/POST + response transform) for future internet-connected features.
known_issues: Motoko chatAsk ignores the user’s question and returns all glossary/learning/article sources, producing large payloads and low-quality relevance.
“Use Web Sources” toggle exists in the chat widget UI but is disabled; backend does not yet return internetResult sources from real outcalls.
Backend getMarketStatus() and isMarketOpen() are stubbed to always return false; frontend relies on client-side IST market-hours logic for “Live/Closed” labeling.
Backend does not fetch live NIFTY 50 prices; stock data must be populated/updated via admin calls, so the ticker may be empty or stale.
submitFeedback on the backend requires the caller to have the #user role; ContactPage does not enforce login, so unauthenticated users will fail to submit feedback.
Blog timestamps are likely incorrect: addBlog/updateBlog set lastUpdatedAt to publishedAt (not current time), and updateBlogUpdatedTime uses a forced timestamp rather than Time.now().
Blogs list ordering is unspecified (Map iteration order); UI may show posts in non-chronological order unless sorted client-side or server-side.

Several calculators use simplified assumptions (e.g., FD assumes quarterly compounding; RD uses a simplified accumulation approach; APY uses an approximate matrix), so results may differ from official/bank-specific rules.
XIRR uses a basic Newton–Raphson approximation without robust handling for derivative≈0/non-convergence; some cashflow patterns may yield unstable results.

Admin page direct path '/admin' on icp0 can fail with gateway 'couldn't determine the destination canister' error; app may require hash-based routing (e.g., '#/admin') or proper canister-aware routing configuration.
